sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will walks away from his apartment, hoping for the time to pass so he does not have to think or remember about anything.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: But every time he passes by some store he and Anna frequent, it would make him remember Anna even more.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: As he walks, Will catches a sweet smell he can never like.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Itâ€™s the smell of a bakery, a very nostalgic one.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will glances to his left, and he sees a familiar bakery. It is the bakery that he and Anna frequently visit.
